job.title: Machine Learning Engineer, Partnerships
job.description: Our mission at OpenAI is to discover and enact the path to safe, beneficial AGI. To do this, we believe that many technical breakthroughs are needed in generative modeling, reinforcement learning, large scale optimization, and active learning - among other topics.The OpenAI Applied AI Research team acts as a bridge between the research organization and our customers. By working on real world use cases we learn what our technology is capable of today, and which research areas might be interesting to focus our research efforts in for the future.Weâre looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to work directly with close partners and large enterprise customers to make them successful with OpenAIâs technology. Youâll help customers with solution design and implementation details.As a Machine Learning Engineer on the Applied AI Research team, you should be able to:Take our latest AI technology and integrate it into our partnersâ solutionsPartner with sales, product and engineering teams to design solutions for strategic partnershipsLead the technical design and implementation of the API on partnersâ internal infrastructureServe as the chief technical consultant for customers during their integrationOwn and drive relationships with external technical audiences of all kinds â from an engineer to the CTO â to understand business objectives and translate requirements into solutionsWork on solutions-oriented engineering and research problemsDevelop integration support material and documentation for new products and featuresContribute to our enterprise strategyThis role may be a good fit for you if you:Enjoy working directly with customers and solving their problemsOpening up the boundaries on practical AI technologiesThrive in driving ambiguity towards clarityLike collaborating across teams and functionsEnjoy running experiments in a rigorous wayWeâre Looking For a Blend OfConsulting, or solution architect experienceMachine learning experienceSoftware engineering experienceProblem solving abilityExcellent communication skills to any audienceAbout OpenAIWeâre building safe Artificial General Intelligence (AGI), and ensuring it leads to a good outcome for humans. We believe that unreasonably great results are best delivered by a highly creative group working in concert. We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.This position is subject to a background check for any convictions directly related to its duties and responsibilities. Only job-related convictions will be considered and will not automatically disqualify the candidate. Pursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance, we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request accommodations via accommodation@openai.com.BenefitsHealth, dental, and vision insurance for you and your familyUnlimited time off (we encourage 4+ weeks per year)Parental leaveFlexible work hoursLunch and dinner each day401(k) plan with matching
